getRMS¶

Radar.getRMS(target='hydrometeors')[source]¶
Loads the Peak Width RMS in m/s of the desired target from all netCDF-Files returns them as one
array. Allowed targets are: “hydrometeors” or “all”. The default is “hydrometeors”.
Parameters:target – String: can be either “hydrometeors” or “all”
Returns:2D-numpy array containing LDR in m/s for all heigts and timesteps.
